content: **ps ⭐️ i m a season 8 knit star ⭐️ shop this season s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 here 1 ** a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 2 tote all of your essentials with this sophisticated hobo style bag sport it as a daily oversized purse a carry-on for your distant travels or a weekender for your next road trip shop the full kit here 3 **sizes** one size **finished dimensions** width 18 /46cm height 15 /38cm handle length 10 /25 5cm space between handles 5 5 /14cm **difficulty level** easy **skills** the single_crochet slip_stitch working into the back loops only working flat in back and forth row and in the round all patterns are written in standard us terms sign up for info on special offers sales and new pattern releases bit ly/townewsletter **connect** instagram @twoofwands facebook facebook com/twoofwands pinterest pinterest com/twoofwandsknits youtube youtube com/twoofwandsknits **help** join the crew of wands facebook group 4 to connect with other makers of two of wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions **selling finished items** small batch sales of finished pieces made from this pattern are permitted but seller must use their own photographs and credit must be given to two of wands as the designer the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of two of wands and are for personal non-commercial use only these files are protected by us copyright and you may not distribute or sell them electronically or physically 1 https //go knitstars com/season-8-ref afmc=1z 2 https //www twoofwands com/blog/huntington-carryall 3 https //bit ly/huntingtonkit 4 https //www facebook com/groups/2228982030505289
